attributes.action: Extend furlough pay for the aviation/travel industry
attributes.additional_details: The aviation and travel industry is the worse affected sector by Covid-19. Most airlines/travel companies/ travel agents are struggling the most due borders being closed. This will take a long time to go back to before coronavirus hit the UK. A lot of us are struggling to either find temp/perm work as all our experience is in the travel industry. A lot of us are uncertain of our futures, whether we are being made redundant or even going through major mental health issues. The world is slowly going back to “normal” but for now we don’t no when the travel industry will be back to pre-COVID. Please sign to see if the government can help change this for us all!
attributes.background: Pay the travel/aviation industry furlough until they are back to work fully.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Extend furlough scheme for the UK Aviation sector to help stop redundancies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331434

Extend the furlough scheme at 80% until at least December 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330657
